weekly picks (Aug 3 week 2023)

Posted on August 14, 2023 in 2023aug,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Aug 3rd week collection

  1. 2308.07261 No superconductivity in Pb$_9$Cu$_1$(PO$_4$)$_6$O found in orbital and spin fluctuation exchange calculations (LK99, arXiv)

  2. 2308.06875 Doping-dependent superconducting physical quantities of K-doped BaFe$_2$As$_2$ obtained through infrared spectroscopy (JSHwang, arXiv)

  3. 2308.06684 Entertaining the Possibility of RT Superconductivity in LK-99 (LK99, arXiv)

  4. 2308.06030 Role of higher-order spin interactions in the emergence of chiral magnetic configurations in lithium-decorated monolayer CrTe$_{2}$ (Cr spin model, arXiv)

  5. 2308.06589 On the Experimental Evidence for Possible Superconductivity in LK99 (LK99, arXiv)

  6. 2308.06349 Statistical Material Law Support for Room Temperature Superconductivity in the Lead Apatite System (LK99, arXiv)

  7. 2308.06881 Temperature-dependent $f$-electron evolution in CeCoIn$_5$ via a comparative infrared study with LaCoIn$_5$ (JSHwang, arXiv)

  8. 2308.07295 Cu-doped Pb$_{10}$(PO$_4$)$_6$O, and V doped SrTiO$_3$ – a tutorial on electron-crystal lattice coupling in insulating materials with transition metal dopants (LK99, arXiv)

  9. 2308.06761 Anisotropic Rashba splitting dominated by out-of-plane spin polarization in two-dimensional Janus $XA_{2}Y$ ($A$= Si, Sn, Ge; $X,Y$= Sb, Bi) with surface imperfection (arXiv)

  10. 2308.06716 Novel magnetic topological insulator FeBi$_2$Te$_4$ with controllable topological quantum phase (magnetic TI, arXiv)

  11. 2308.06415 A first-principles study of bilayer 1T’-WTe2/CrI3: A candidate topological spin filter (arXiv)

  12. 2308.06256 Single crystal synthesis, structure, and magnetism of Pb$_{10-x}$Cu$_x$(PO$_4$)$_6$O (LK99, arXiv)

  13. 2308.05919 Piezostrain-induced in-plane anisotropy of superconducting transition temperature for FeSe0.5Te0.5 thin films (arXiv)

  14. 2308.05791 Transport anomalies in multiband superconductors near quantum critical point (arXiv)

  15. 2308.05786 Ferromagnetism and insulating behavior with a logarithmic temperature dependence of resistivity in $Pb_{10-x}Cu_x\left( PO_4 \right) _6O$ (LK99 HHWen, arXiv)

  16. 2308.05778 Current percolation model for the special resistivity behavior observed in Cu-doped Apatite (LK99, arXiv)

  17. 2308.06222 High-temperature superconductivity induced by the Su-Schrieffer-Heeger electron-phonon coupling (HYao, arXiv)

  18. 2308.06073 Emergent inductance from spin fluctuations in strongly correlated magnets (TOh Nagaosa, arXiv)

  19. 2308.05803 Nature of the current-induced insulator-to-metal transition in Ca$_2$RuO$_4$ as revealed by transport-ARPES (arXiv)

  20. 2308.05773 Comment on “Identification of the Mott Insulating Charge Density Wave State in $1T$-TaS$_2$” (arXiv)

  21. 2308.06068 Goodenough-Kanamori-Anderson rules in 2D magnet: A chemical trend in MCl2 with M=V, Mn, and Ni (arXiv)

  22. 2308.05796 Crystalline-electromagnetic responses of higher order topological semimetals (Hughes, arXiv)
